ViewObject.Name: VwKreditoryMove
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT VW_MOVE_5091.ID, VW_MOVE_5091.FULLNAME, VW_MOVE_5091.CODE, VW_MOVE_5091.KREDIT, VW_MOVE_5091.DEBET, VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID, VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME, VW_MOVE_5091.PERIOD, VW_MOVE_5091.KEYID, CASE WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('orders') THEN 'Заказ №' || (SELECT orders.NUM FROM orders WHERE orders.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT orders.DAT FROM orders WHERE orders.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('pko') THEN 'ПКО №' || (SELECT pko.NUM FROM pko WHERE pko.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT pko.DAT FROM pko WHERE pko.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('rko') THEN 'РКО №' || (SELECT rko.NUM FROM rko WHERE rko.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT rko.DAT FROM rko WHERE rko.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('other_zatraty') THEN 'Админ. затраты №' || (SELECT other_zatraty.NUM FROM other_zatraty WHERE other_zatraty.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT other_zatraty.DAT FROM other_zatraty WHERE other_zatraty.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('start_ost') THEN 'Нач. остатки №' || (SELECT start_ost.NUM FROM start_ost WHERE start_ost.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT start_ost.DAT FROM start_ost WHERE start_ost.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') WHEN upper(VW_MOVE_5091.TABLE_NAME) LIKE upper('PROFIT_DISTRIB') THEN 'Прибыль ('||(SELECT (select fullname from divisions where id = profit_distrib.division_id) FROM PROFIT_DISTRIB WHERE PROFIT_DISTRIB.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID )||') №' || (SELECT PROFIT_DISTRIB.NUM FROM PROFIT_DISTRIB WHERE PROFIT_DISTRIB.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ) || ' от ' || TO_CHAR( (SELECT PROFIT_DISTRIB.DAT FROM PROFIT_DISTRIB WHERE PROFIT_DISTRIB.ID = VW_MOVE_5091.REGISTRATOR_ID ), 'DD-MM-YYYY') END AS REG_STRING FROM VW_MOVE_5091 ORDER BY PERIOD DESC
